page.title: 15RELIGION IN LAUGHARNE
page.content: Laugharne district has four churches: St Martin's in Laugharne, St Margaret's in Llandawke, St Sadwrnen in Llansadurnen and a Congregational Chapel in Laugharne. St Martin's has about 35 attending on Sunday's two services, with 2 held daily and Holy Eucharist on Wednesday. Sunday school has 26 pupils and 3 teachers. There are 32 choristers and 3 organists and 15 candidates at last Confirmation. Money raised at "Church Fayre" last November was Â£1605. There were 3 marriages in Church. In Llansadurnen a service is held every Sunday for about 18. In Llandawke Holy Eucahrist is held at Christmas and Easter and a Harvest Thanksgiving in September. The Chapel has occasional services for about 15 members. There are no other organized religious communities in the district.
